testcase.classname: As a user, I want to be able to access the Ticket List via API connection.
testcase.name: user/ticket/list endpoint'ine gecerli authorization bilgileri ile bir GET request
testcase.system-out: Given API user sets "user/ticket/list" path parameters......................passed And API user saves the response from the user ticket list endpoint..........passed Then API user verifies status code is 200...................................passed And API user verifies that the remark information in the response body is "success".passed
